attributes.action: Upgrade the whole of Britain to Fibre Optic Broadband
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the PM to upgrade the whole country to Fibre Optic cables for Broadband services instead of using
Copper Wires for Broadband services and for Copper Wires to be phased out totally except for the use of Telephones and Telephone based services
